education.title: CM’s Scholarship Scheme
education.description: A flagship annual scholarship for all domiciled students of Meghalaya from Class XI to PhD.
education.eligibility: Permanent resident of Meghalaya; currently enrolled in Class XI up to PhD level (regular mode); no income ceiling.
education.benefits: Annual financial grant of ₹6,000 directly transferred to the student's bank account.

education.title: Meghalaya Post-Matric Scholarship
education.description: Central-state scholarship for SC/ST/OBC/EWS students pursuing higher education.
education.eligibility: SC/ST/OBC/EWS category; Annual family income < ₹2.5 Lakhs; must have passed Class 10/12.
education.benefits: Maintenance allowance (up to ₹1,200/month for hostellers) + Full reimbursement of compulsory tuition fees.

education.title: Free Studentship Scheme
education.description: Assistance for tuition fees for students who are not receiving any other scholarships.
education.eligibility: Permanent resident of Meghalaya; SC/ST/OBC students only; not receiving any other central/state scholarship.
education.benefits: Direct reimbursement of tuition fees ranging from ₹1,105 to ₹2,235 depending on the course and stream.

education.title: Border Areas Scholarship
education.description: Financial support for students living in notified international border areas of the state.
education.eligibility: Student's village must be in a notified Border Area; parents must not be in government service; studying up to Degree level.
education.benefits: Annual stipend/subsidy to help with educational costs in economically distressed border regions.

health.title: Megha Health Insurance Scheme (MHIS VI)
health.description: Universal health insurance converged with Ayushman Bharat (PM-JAY).
health.eligibility: All citizens of Meghalaya except central and state government employees.
health.benefits: Cashless treatment up to ₹5.3 Lakhs per family per year at empaneled hospitals.

health.title: CM Care+ Scheme
health.description: A top-up scheme for critical care beyond the standard MHIS limits.
health.eligibility: Residents of Meghalaya enrolled in MHIS whose treatment costs exceed the ₹5.3 Lakh limit.
health.benefits: Additional financial aid for high-cost procedures like organ transplants and advanced cancer care.

health.title: Janani Shishu Suraksha Karyakaram (JSSK)
health.description: Zero out-of-pocket expense for delivery and neonatal care.
health.eligibility: All pregnant women and sick newborns (up to 30 days) visiting government health facilities.
health.benefits: Free delivery (Normal/C-Section), drugs, diagnostics, diet, and free transport from home and back.

health.title: Rashtriya Bal Swasthya Karyakram (RBSK)
health.description: Child screening program covering the '4 Ds' (Defects, Diseases, Deficiencies, Developmental delays).
health.eligibility: All children from birth up to 18 years of age.
health.benefits: Free health screening and free management/treatment (including surgeries) for 32 identified health conditions.

government.title: CM-Elevate (Transport Scheme)
government.description: Entrepreneurship program providing subsidies for commercial vehicles.
government.eligibility: Permanent residents aged 18-58; must be individual entrepreneurs or registered/unregistered community groups.
government.benefits: 75% government subsidy on project cost; 5% entrepreneur contribution; 20% bank loan.

government.title: PMAY-G (Meghalaya)
government.description: Housing scheme for rural families to build permanent homes.
government.eligibility: Families living in kucha/dilapidated houses; listed in SECC 2011 or Awaas+ list; must not own a pucca house.
government.benefits: Financial grant of approx ₹1.3 Lakh + ₹12,000 for toilet construction + 90 days of MGNREGA wages.

government.title: FOCUS+ (Livelihood)
government.description: Support for farmers' producer groups to upscale production and marketing.
government.eligibility: Small and marginal farmers; must be part of a registered Producer Group (PG).
government.benefits: Direct cash transfer of ₹5,000 per individual farmer to boost agricultural activity.

government.title: MGNREGA (Meghalaya)
government.description: Guaranteed unskilled wage employment for rural households.
government.eligibility: Adult members (18+) of rural households willing to do unskilled manual labor.
government.benefits: Guaranteed 100 days of work; unemployment allowance if work is not provided within 15 days.
